attributes.action: Abandon Stop and Search powers to be given to police under new Anti-Terror laws.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British government is debating  giving police officers in the UK "stop and question" powers under new anti-terror laws.

"THERE was always the danger of concealed microphones by which your voice might be picked up." George O.

Please read more at the following links:

http://www.ireland.com/newspaper/breaking/2007/0527/breaking18.htm

http://news.scotsman.com/uk.cfm?id=825332007

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
